title: Codine
abstract: Note: Adapted from the novel by Panait Istrati.
description: Codine has just finished a ten year sentence for murder and heads back to a Bucharest slum to be reunited with his mother, whose penny-pinching ways infuriate her son. Adrien, a young boy, befriends Codine and through his eyes discovers social injustice and the world of adults. Awards: Cannes Film Festival 1963: Best screenplay for Henri Colpi, Yves Jamiaque and Dimitriu Carabat.  Credits: Producer, Emile Breysse ; director, Henri Colpi ; writers, Henri Colpi, Yves Jamiaque, Dimitriu Carabat ; photography, Marcel Weiss ; music, Theodor Grigoriu. Cast: Alexandru Platon, Nelly Borgeaud, Razvan Petresco, Francoise Brion, Maurice Sarfati, Nelly Borgeaud.
